SEARCH
Package smsapp.student

Class StudentManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
smsapp.student.StudentManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
StudentManager
public class StudentManagerImpl extends Object implements StudentManager
Implementation of the StudentManager interface that manages the operations related to students, such as adding, removing, updating, displaying, and calculating the average grade. It interacts with the StudentRepository to perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations.

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(Student student) throws SQLException
      Adds a new student to the system. If a student with the same ID already exists, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Specified by:
      addStudent in interface StudentManager
      Parameters:
      student - The student to be added
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs while saving the student
      IllegalArgumentException - If a student with the provided ID already exists

    • removeStudent

      public void removeStudent(String studentID) throws SQLException
      Removes a student from the system based on their student ID. If the student does not exist, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Specified by:
      removeStudent in interface StudentManager
      Parameters:
      studentID - The ID of the student to be removed
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs while removing the student
      IllegalArgumentException - If the student with the provided ID does not exist

    • updateStudent

      public void updateStudent(Student student) throws SQLException
      Updates the information of an existing student. If the student does not exist, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Specified by:
      updateStudent in interface StudentManager
      Parameters:
      student - The student with updated information
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs while updating the student
      IllegalArgumentException - If the student with the provided ID does not exist

    • displayAllStudents

      public ArrayList<Student> displayAllStudents() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all students stored in the system.
      Specified by:
      displayAllStudents in interface StudentManager
      Returns:
      A list of all students
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs while retrieving the students

    • calculateAverageGrade

      public double calculateAverageGrade() throws SQLException
      Calculates the average grade of all students. The average is computed from the grades of all students retrieved from the repository.
      Specified by:
      calculateAverageGrade in interface StudentManager
      Returns:
      The average grade of all students
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs while retrieving the students
      IllegalStateException - If no students exist, preventing the average calculation
